name: estimably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is considered to be very good or deserving praise: The book is in the form of a series of studies, all estimably written. The audience seemed to be estimably cultured and knowledgable about the subject. Compare
inestimablyRelated word
estimable
More examplesFewer examplesThe organization has estimably won a lot of admirers over the years.He is an estimably scholarly author, with many books and articles to his name.The police have been estimably honest about their failure to find any evidence.
